title: Ping increased by 15 ?
body: My ping was at a steady 47 for a long time, and 3 days ago it increased to 62... any reason for this?  I live in Alabama.

replies.body: Same here (Florida, comcast). About midday wednesday my ping jumped up 12-15ms and it hasn't gone down since. Feels higher at times, getting random input delays etc. Packet loss is minimal and ping is stable around 55ms (used to get 40). I think it was right after the login issues that lasted a couple hours or so.
I live in Mississippi and it happened to me as well. After the patch I suddenly had 10 more ping than usual. It affects my gameplay a little.

Your change in ping could be due to a few reasons with your network, like packet loss or the routing of your ISP.  As a first step, I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  You can also use the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for matches you've experienced a change in ping to get an overview of possible issues.  That should help!
